subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: U.C.L.A. quarterback Ben Olson will have surgery on his broken right foot, an injury that is expected to keep him out for at least two months. Kevin Craft, a transfer from Mount San Antonio College, and the redshirt freshman Chris Forcier are expected to compete for the Bruins’ starting job.
